Description: Unique identifier for the site (i.e., sampling data/sampling location combination)

Location that the fish was collected
Sea surface salinity in parts per thousand (ppt)
Sea surface temperature in degrees Celcius
Approximate number of salmon captured in the seine net
Number of salmon (both species) examined for sea lice and entered into the database
Number of pink salmon examined for sea lice and entered into the database
Number of chum salmon examined for sea lice and entered into the database
Number of sockeye salmon examined for sea lice and entered into the database
Number of salmon mortalities in the recovery bucket (i.e., of those fish that were examined)
Number of salmon mortalities out of fish that were not examined, e.g., in the seine net during beach seining due to rough weather
Approximate number of pink salmon to the number of chum salmon in column 15
Approximate number of chum salmon to the number of pink salmon in column 14
Latitude of sample site in decimal degrees North
Longitude of sample site decimal degrees West
